---
id: stop-cloud-transcode
title: "StopCloudTranscode"
description: "调用本接口，停止单流转码任务。"
api: 
info_path: core_products/real-time-voice-video/zh/server/api-reference/stream-mixing/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>StopCloudTranscode</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


调用本接口，停止单流转码任务。

“客户端”基于转码模板触发的单流转码介绍，请参考 [单流转码](/real-time-video-android-java/live-streaming/single-stream-transcoding)；
“服务端”的相关回调，请参考 [单流转码开始回调](/real-time-video-server/callback/transcoding/on-demand-transcoding-started) 和 [单流转码停止回调](/real-time-video-server/callback/transcoding/on-demand-transcoding-stopped)。

 <Note title="调用频率限制">100 次/秒</Note>

## Request
